text: We build products and technologies that makes access to web data very simple, so the informed enterprise buyers help them make the best decisions. Enterprises rely on data to win and web data is becoming a dominant part of data strategy. We have a vision to make quality data accessible to these businesses at scale. At Grabser, we envision empowering enterprises with data that truly

matters to them. We currently process billions of data points on a daily basis for our customers. Over the years, we perfected the art of collecting data at scale and ensuring quality. We continuously build and invest in tech to put data quality at the forefront because we know our data is mission-critical to our customers.
